    • getCategory

      public static String getCategory(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EModelElement modelElement)

    • collectTypeDependencies

      public static Collection<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClassifier> collectTypeDependencies(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass)
      Collects type dependencies for a given class - attribute types, eoperation return and exception types, eparameter types. Does not collect reference types and supertypes, as they are reported differently, but collects their generic parameter types.
      Parameters:
      eClass -
      Returns:

    • collectGenericTypeDependencies

      public static Collection<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClassifier> collectGenericTypeDependencies(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EGenericType type, boolean includeEClassifier, Predicate<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EGenericType> predicate)
      Collects generic type dependencies, i.e. classifiers used in generic type definition.
      Parameters:
      type - Generic type
      includeEClassifier - if true, include EClassifier of the type itself. Otherwise, only EClassifiers of referenced generic types - bounds, type arguments, and type parameter.
      Returns:
      A set of EClassifier's.

      Resolves reference relative to the resource.
      Parameters:
      resource - Used to resolve relative references if not null.
      reference - Reference.
      Returns:
